member.param: The name of the bucket to connect to.
member.remarks: If the password is null, the bucket name will be used. Set to String.Empty to use an empty password.

member.name: T:NorthScale.Store.VBucketAwareOperationFactory
member.summary: Membase requires each item operation to have a vbucket index set in the request's "reserved" field. (This is used for replicatiom and failover.) This op factory provides customized operations handling these indexes.

member.returns: A new object for the specified resource.
